data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: My hometown has totally changed in the last few years. Fields I used to go early morning playing with my Dad are now industrial units, where we went horse riding is a massive car retail park. Housing and other developments have concreted over the countryside where we played. The town center is totally different too; the old market has disappeared, there are now only multinational companies and a big shopping center. Even the lovely old wobbly building where I went to ballet has been pulled down and replaced with a conference center. Seriously, any empty space that existed within the town borders has been filled by shopping/living space. The changes are constantly shocking to me, and I really hope the government will do something to stop those changes.（128 字）
data.referenceText: What are some noticeable changes that have occurred in your hometown or country in the last few years?
data.referenceTranslate: 在过去的几年里，你的家乡或国家发生了哪些显著的变化?
